body: lmao I hope people won't complain about NTR again when this gets a translation, hara's art is god tier and doesn't deserve  that
果然“糖分超标”，果然欧亨利~
kinda like an NTR but it turned out wholesome at the end I guessed?

Basically: He had his eyes on the girl even tho she was getting maried to the 1st prince of another country. Went as you saw and then rumors started due to them being too loud (pg 20) and it obviously reached the prince that said something like "Your white is actually semen you slut" and went back to his country. Tan guy then said "We bribe the king and it's all good. No heads flying", but then the king said "Oh well shit happened so i'll get you 2 married and that's it". Then they married, tan turned into king and they had that photo where they had this face like shit without even looking at each other (lmao). NTR? Kinda. Guess it falls more into netori, but thankfully since its Hara, it's rather soft/mild so that's that. Also i'm not so sure but i think it said that those 2 lived happy together so that's nice too
结局有点欧亨利，感觉会出点大事儿但突然很平淡的结束了哈哈哈哈哈
